The Xenoforce follow Hot Rod.
Pegatron:At last some battle.I'm in!
Siref:I'll fight on your side Hot Rod.
Lyas:Time to kick some ass!
Moren:Anytime you ask.
Rycal:I think you'll need my help.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon/Hot Rod/Prowl/Skyburst::
> 
> Epyon holds his ground as he is hit, and starts to clup on Lyas 
back. 
> 
> Hot Rod rolls out to the apron and gets up, when Aerotaur's message
> comes in. He opens a comm back to them.
> "You got it. I'll be coming with reinforcements ASAP. Who's 
attacking
> you anyway?"
> 
> As Hot Rod waits for the reply, Prowl steps up.
> "Time out, guys, you heard that. Hot Rod, Epyon, Skyburst, you guys 
are
> going to come with me, to help them."
> He looked to Lyas, and the others.
> "You guys can help too."
> 
> They all leave the holoroom, and pass by the Med Bay.
> "Khonkolor, we are going to go help the Chivtron's in a battle, want 
to
> come?" Asks Prowl.
> 
> Prowl and the others dont really wait for a reply, they continue on 
out,
> and pass Ghost and Goth.
> "Some of our friends are in trouble. We going to help. You guys want 
to
> join us?" Asked Skyburst.
> 
> They all waited for a minute, before leaving, to get the responses 
from
> Pegatron's group, Khonkolor, Ghost, Goth, and the reply from 
Aerotaur.
